name: Penelope & Whiskers: The Case of the Missing China
name_original: Penelope & Whiskers: The Case of the Missing China
description:
A curious and spirited girl, Penelope  Davis, has been sent to stay with her great Aunt for the summer in the country bumpkin town of Tamale, Mississippi. She spends her days with her Aunt's fat cat, Whiskers, and completing puzzles to become an ace detective like her mother. After  Aunt Etta’s china goes missing during a dinner party, Penelope gets an opportunity to prove that her detective and puzzle-solving skills are just as sharp as her mom's. Prove your mettle to the  Tamale, MS station chief by solving various puzzles and get a chance to discover the true culprit behind the dinner china theft. 

This games includes multiple puzzles, bonus puzzles earned throughout play, and hidden easter egg puzzles.

Similar games: Professor Layton, Ni No Kuni, Ace Wright Attorney
